short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Checks if the current website is registered in the Green Web Registry.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is simple. It allows to check any website on the fly. It runs a script to check if the domain is registered in the green web registry and respons with the answer. From the extension you can send the test results to Oslo Analytic for further investigation - or visit Oslo Analytic to do further test and more..
